Trade/Device Name(s): SEFRIA Methamphetamine Oral Fluid Enzyme Immunoassay
Specimen Container(s): Quantisal II Oral Fluid Collection Device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Immunalysis SEFRIA Methamphetamine Oral Fluid Enzyme Immunoassay for qualitative and semi-quantitative methamphetamine detection in oral fluid using clinical chemistry analyzers
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative and semi-quantitative analysis of methamphetamine in human oral fluid collected by Quantisal or Quantisal II devices, providing preliminary analytical test results for clinical laboratory use
